messages.message: for aggregate view, i want to see the result of the field _and_ the document... the file name isn't enough, because i can't verify whether the field result is correct unless i'm actually looking at the document

in this case, i was trying to extract the card cost, which i know is a number. but other prompts i tried would sometimes get different numbers. and i don't know the number i want offhand so its hard to tell
I actually think we should never _not_ show the doc widget
damn this is the kind of thing you realize only when you dogfood your own product huh
this could maybe be a popup that opens below the doc
its like "how hard can it be to extract the cost of a card?" and the answer is: quite hard, if you're not prompt engineering
